title: Relates to taxes on cigarettes sold on an Indian reservation to non-members of the Indian nation or tribe
summary: Relates to taxes on cigarettes sold on an Indian reservation to non-members of the Indian nation or tribe; reverts the tax back to the previous $2.75 if taxes on such cigarettes are not collected by 9/1/2011 and then changes the tax to $4.35 once the state begins collecting such taxes.
